entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned as receiving a scroll from Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Harry's friend who gives him a scroll with Dumble d o r e 's lesson.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The teacher mentioned in the lesson on the scroll.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who is skeptical about Filch's Secrecy Sensor.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who is present when Harry reads the lesson on the scroll.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: The caretaker of Hogwarts who checks the names of people going into Hogsmeade.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: A village near Hogwarts where students are allowed to go on weekends.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Ginny's friend who she is going with to Hogsmeade.

entities.name: secrecy sensor
entities.description: A device used by Filch to check for hidden objects or spells.

relationships.description: Ginny gives Harry a scroll with Dumble d o r e 's lesson.
Harry is a student of Dumbledore, as mentioned in the lesson on the scroll.
